display_name: Columbia Suicide Severity Ratings Scale: In the last 3 months, have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?
description:
Item from a modified version of the CSSRS Questionnaire. [Salvi 2019 (PMID: 31039299)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7974826/)

[Search for all CSSRS Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=cssrs)
